title: "DOE, West Virginia adopt Google Cloud services"
excerpt: "Google LLC today said it has forged a five-year deal to provide the U.S. Department of Energy access to a “broad range” of Google Cloud technologies, on top of another deal to have 22,000 state of Virginia employees use the newly rebranded Google Workspace tools formerly known as G Suite."
